description: Turn the classic salmon bagel on its head with this super salad recipe of sesame- and poppy seed-crusted salmon, crispy bagels and cream cheese dressing.
name: Salmon Bagel Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 multigrain bagels, each sliced crossways into 4 rounds
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1 bunch dill, 1/2 finely chopped, 1/2 fronds picked
1 Lebanese cucumber, thinly sliced into rounds
1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill to high. Place bagel slices on a baking tray. Grill for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Set aside.
Meanwhile, combine sesame seeds, poppy seeds and garlic in a shallow bowl. Pat salmon dry with paper towels, then coat both sides of salmon in seed mixture.
Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook salmon for 2 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking.
Meanwhile, combine cream cheese, lemon juice and chopped dill in a small bowl. Add cup water and stir until combined. Season with pepper.
Divide rocket, cucumber and onion among bowls. Top with salmon, dressing, capers and dill fronds. Serve with bagel crisps and lemon cheeks.
